messages.content: Given the above details about a soccer program, generate a concise summary.
What is the annual cost of the soccer program?
The annual cost of the soccer program is $3,000, excluding the uniform fee of $450.
Given the above details about a soccer program, generate a concise summary.
Where are the soccer training sessions held?
Training sessions are held at Poly Prep, Brooklyn College, and New Utrecht High School.
Given the above details about a soccer program, generate a concise summary.
What are the qualifications of the soccer coaches?
Our coaches are USSF certified, holding D, C, or B licenses, including UEFA PRO license holder Angelo Orlando.
Given the above details about a soccer program, generate a concise summary.
Is there a parent-teacher association or similar parent involvement group?
Yes, we encourage parent involvement and have a parent-teacher association that plays an active role in club activities and decision-making.
Given the above details about a soccer program, generate a concise summary.
What are the club's communication channels for updates and announcements?
We communicate with our members through various channels including email, our website, and social media platforms for all updates and announcements.
Given the above details about a soccer program, generate a concise summary.
Do you offer scholarships or financial aid for talented players?
Yes, we offer scholarships and financial aid for talented players based on merit and need. Details about the application process are available on our website.
Given the above details about a soccer program, generate a concise summary.
How can I volunteer for club events or activities?
We greatly appreciate volunteer support. Interested individuals can sign up for volunteering on our website or contact our club office for more information.
Given the above details about a soccer program, generate a concise summary.
Are there any special programs for advanced players?
For advanced players, we offer specialized training programs and opportunities to compete at higher levels, including regional and national tournaments.
Given the above details about a soccer program, generate a concise summary.
Please provide details about the expenses, facilities, and coaches of the soccer program.

Annual Cost is $3000. This cost excludes the separate charge of $450 for uniforms. Our coaching staff includes Balint Barabas, Francesco Caorsi, Adam Marcu, Ben Marcu, Joe Balsamo, and Cesare Marconi, all of whom are USSF certified with either a D, C, or B license. We also have the expertise of Angelo Orlando who holds a UEFA PRO license. Matches and training sessions take place at locations such as Poly Prep, Brooklyn College, and New Utrecht High School. Financial support options are available but are subject to criteria, more information can be found online. Matches and leagues we participate in include the CJSL, MLS NEXT, NAL, and USL A, A schedule of which can also be found on our website.
Given the above details about a soccer program, generate a concise summary.
Could you share information about the cost, coaching staff, and facilities available for your soccer program?

Certainly, the expenses for the program stand to be about $3000 annually, not including the $450 for uniforms. Our coaching team is quite extensive and highly qualified. We have Balint Barabas and Francesco Caorsi, both holding USSF D licenses, along with Adam and Ben Marcu, who are both USSF B licensed. Angelo Orlando is our UEFA PRO certified coach and Joe Balsamo along with Cesare Marconi hold USSF B and C licenses respectively. Training sessions and matches are conducted at prime facilities like Poly Prep, Brooklyn College, and New Utrecht High School. We do provide financial aid, based on certain eligibility criteria, which can be found on our official website. Also, our match schedules, including the CJSL, MLS NEXT, NAL, and USL A leagues can be reviewed online.
Given the above details about a soccer program, generate a concise summary.
Could you tell me about the costs, coaches, and amenities associated with your soccer program?

Absolutely, the yearly fee for our soccer program is $3000, with an additional charge of $450 for uniforms. We are proud to house top-notch coaches like Balint Barabas and Francesco Caorsi, both having USSF D licenses and Adam Marcu, Ben Marcu, and Joe Balsamo with USSF B licenses. We also have Cesare Marconi with a USSF C license and Angelo Orlando with a UEFA Pro license. The program comprises well-sustained facilities at Poly Prep, Brooklyn College, and New Utrecht High School. Financial aid is provided, with all relevant criteria detailed on our website. Matches are organized across several leagues including CJSL, MLS NEXT, NAL, and USL A. For the schedule details, please check online.
Given the above details about a soccer program, generate a concise summary.
Can you detail the expenditure, supportive personnel, and infrastructure linked with your soccer scheme?

Sure, the annual financial requirement for our soccer scheme is $3000, with an extra expenditure of $450 for the necessary uniform wear. Our talented coaching crew involve Balint Barabas and Francesco Caorsi who both carry USSF D certifications, Adam Marcu, Ben Marcu, and Joe Balsamo who are USSF B certified, and Cesare Marconi who is USSF C certified. Besides these, we have Angelo Orlando who possesses UEFA PRO credentials. We conduct our training sessions and fixtures on well-kept grounds at Poly Prep, Brooklyn College, and New Utrecht High School. Financial assistance is provided, based on some prerequisites that have been explained online. For match information and league participations which includes CJSL, MLS NEXT, NAL, USL A, etc., kindly refer to the information posted on our website.

Of course! The yearly fee for our program stands at $3000, but be aware that this doesn't include the $450 uniform charge. Our coaching squad consists of a mix of expertise, starting with Balint Barabas and Francesco Caorsi, who both hold USSF D licenses. Adam Marcu, Ben Marcu, and Joe Balsamo all boast USSF B licenses, and Cesare Marconi has a USSF C license. Adding international flavor, we also have Angelo Orlando who carries a UEFA PRO pass. We utilize top-quality venues such as Poly Prep, Brooklyn College, and New Utrecht High School for our training sessions and matches. We offer financial support packages, but they're subject to certain criteria which can be viewed online. Lastly, we compete in several leagues such as CJSL, MLS NEXT, NAL, and USL A, and the schedule for these can also be found on our official website.
